item.description:
Bonjour tout le monde! Do you love French language and culture?
For this meeting, there's a theme! Please come with a photo and tell us a story (in French, of course) about something or somewhere that you went. It could be somewhere that you went as a child or adult. Something odd or amusing would be good. Par example: un photo de votre votre visite à la plage, votre ancien auto, la vacance en Provence l'année derniere.
Il ya beaucoup de gens who want to practice speaking French. They would like to parler avec vous! Venez prendre un café and patisserie chez Panera. Look for the table with the Tour Eiffel!!
We meet the 2nd and 4th Wednesday of each month at 7PM.
Bienvenue!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the tables in the back with the Eiffel Tower!
item.why: The people are very nice and it is a nice atmosphere.

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French January Meetup
